channel.title: Fixing bankcolor
channel.description:
solemn wishes made an auto ess mining script with only one problem:
"It works perfectly up to its half way between the bank and the magic shop then it stops and starts moving the mouse ... the bank is to crowded and the bank color must be set manually"
as u can see, he says to set it manually, but i don't know how to do that. i think it has something to do with editing the bank color using a color that he provides if the banks are full (it's in the script)
i attatched the script if u wanna take a look and help

item.title: Fixing bankcolor
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

lol your WAY off on your idea, unless im mistaken and you are right. but he means to pick the color yourself.see the script autopicks the colors for you.so before starting the script just manually pick the color and insert in into the corect place in the script and it should work

Read full topic
